description_for_model: Executes commands in a terminal on the user's local system. Use it to run valid terminal commands for tasks such as file management, system control, and more
description_for_human: Executes commands in a terminal.

tools.name: Execute
tools.summary: Execute a terminal command and return the output. This command should follow proper syntax and be supported by the terminal environment.

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: The command to execute in the terminal.

returns.name: output
returns.description: The output generated by the executed terminal command, including both standard output and standard error streams.

returns.name: exit_code
returns.description: The exit code returned by the executed command. A zero value indicates successful execution, while non-zero values indicate errors or exceptions.

errors.name: UserUnauthorizedError
errors.description: The user is not authorized to execute the command.

errors.name: UserUnverifiedError
errors.description: The user has not yet been verified.

errors.name: UserPermissionError
errors.description: The user lacks the permissions to execute the command.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'command' parameter contains an invalid or malformed command, which results in a failed execution attempt.

description_for_model: Tool for managing emails and contacts in Gmail. Use it to send, search, read, organize, and delete emails, as well as manage and search contacts.
description_for_human: Tool for managing emails and contacts in Gmail.

tools.name: SendEmail
tools.summary: Send an email to one or multiple recipients, with optional scheduling, cc, and bcc.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: A string of email addresses to send to, separated by commas.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The subject of the email.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body of the email.

parameters.name: cc
parameters.description: A string of email addresses to carbon copy (CC) to, separated by commas.

parameters.name: bcc
parameters.description: A string of email addresses to blind carbon copy (BCC) to, separated by commas.

parameters.name: send_at
parameters.description: The scheduled date and time to send the email in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm'.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: An array of local file paths of attachments.

returns.name: success
returns.description: An boolean value indicating whether the email was sent successfully.

errors.name: UserUnauthorizedError
errors.description: The user is not authorized to send the email.

errors.name: UserUnverifiedError
errors.description: The user has not yet been verified.

errors.name: RecipientUnverifiedError
errors.description: The recipient has not yet been verified.

errors.name: RecipientBannedError
errors.description: The recipient's account has been banned.

errors.name: BodyContentLengthError
errors.description: The length of the content in the body is too short.

errors.name: AttachmentSizeError
errors.description: The size of the attachment is too large.

errors.name: AttachmentTypeError
errors.description: The type of the attachment is not supported.

errors.name: AttachmentContentPermissionDeniedError
errors.description: The permission of the content in the attachment is denied.

errors.name: AttachmentContentNotFound
errors.description: The content in the attachment is not found.

errors.name: MaxEmailsExceededError
errors.description: The user has exceeded the maximum number of emails allowed.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The provided email address in 'to', 'cc', or 'bcc' is malformed, any file path in 'attachments' is invalid, or the 'send_at' is not in the correct format.

tools.name: SearchEmails
tools.summary: Search for emails based on keywords, folders, labels, date range, or sender and recipient. If certain arguments are not provided, the corresponding filters are not applied.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: The list of keywords to search for.

parameters.name: folders
parameters.description: The list of folders to search for. Each value should be a valid folder such as 'inbox', 'sent', 'drafts', or 'spam'.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of emails to retrieve. Default is 5.

parameters.name: date_range
parameters.description: An object containing 'start_date' and 'end_date' in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' to filter emails by date range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The sender's email address to filter emails by.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The recipient's email address to filter emails by.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: The list of labels to filter emails by, e.g. 'important'.

errors.name: UserUnverifiedError
errors.description: The user's email has not yet been verified.

errors.name: UserPermissionError
errors.description: The user lacks permissions to search for emails.

errors.name: UserFreeTrialExpiredError
errors.description: The user's free trial has expired.

errors.name: MaxEmailsExceededError
errors.description: The user has exceeded the maximum number of emails allowed.

returns.name: emails
returns.description: An array of at most 'limit' emails that match the search criteria, each containing the 'id', 'subject', 'from', 'to', and 'timestamp' (in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm') of the email.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'limit' is negative or not an integer, the 'date_range' has incorrect date format, or the 'from' or 'to' email addresses are invalid.

tools.name: ReadEmail
tools.summary: Read the content of an email, including attachments.

parameters.name: email_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the email.

returns.name: from
returns.description: The email address the email was sent from.

returns.name: to
returns.description: A string of email addresses that the email was sent to, separated by commas.

returns.name: cc
returns.description: A string of email addresses that the email was cc'ed to, separated by commas.

returns.name: bcc
returns.description: A string of email addresses that the email was bcc'ed to, separated by commas.

returns.name: subject
returns.description: The subject of the email.

returns.name: body
returns.description: The body of the email.

returns.name: timestamp
returns.description: The timestamp of when the email was sent (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss).

returns.name: folder
returns.description: The folder the email is in, such as 'inbox', 'sent', 'drafts', or 'spam'.

returns.name: labels
returns.description: The labels of the email (e.g., `important`).

returns.name: attachments
returns.description: An array of objects with attachment names and ids (attachment_id).

errors.name: SenderUnverifiedError
errors.description: The sender's email has not yet been verified.

errors.name: SenderBlockedError
errors.description: The sender's email has been blocked.

errors.name: MaxEmailsExceededError
errors.description: The user has exceeded the maximum number of emails allowed.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'email_id' is not found.

tools.name: OrganizeEmail
tools.summary: Move an email to a specific folder or update its labels.

parameters.name: email_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the email.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: The folder to move the email to, such as 'inbox', 'sent', 'drafts', or 'spam'.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: A list of updated labels of the email, e.g. 'important'.

returns.name: success
returns.description: A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.

errors.name: UserPermissionError
errors.description: The user lacks permissions to move the email.

errors.name: UserFreeTrialExpiredError
errors.description: The user's free trial has expired.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'email_id' is not found.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'folder' is invalid.

tools.name: DeleteEmails
tools.summary: Delete one or multiple emails from the mailbox.

parameters.name: email_ids
parameters.description: An array of unique identifiers of the emails to be deleted.

returns.name: success
returns.description: A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.

errors.name: UserPermissionError
errors.description: The user lacks permissions to delete the email.

errors.name: UserUnverifiedError
errors.description: The user has not yet been verified.

errors.name: TooManyRequestsError
errors.description: The user has requested to delete too many emails.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: One or more 'email_ids' are not found.

tools.name: AddOrUpdateContact
tools.summary: Add a new contact to the contact list or update an existing contact's information.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the contact. If not provided, a new contact will be added.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the contact. Required when 'contact_id' is not provided.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the contact. Required when 'contact_id' is not provided.

parameters.name: remark
parameters.description: An optional remark or label for the contact.

parameters.name: info
parameters.description: An object containing additional contact information, such as 'phone' and 'address'.

returns.name: contact_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the added or updated contact.

errors.name: MaxContactsExceededError
errors.description: The user has exceeded the maximum number of contacts allowed.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'name' or 'email' is empty when 'contact_id' is not provided, or the 'email' is an invalid email address.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The provided 'contact_id' is not found.

exceptions.name: ConflictException
exceptions.description: A contact with the same email address already exists when adding a new contact or updating an existing contact with a new email address.

tools.name: DeleteContact
tools.summary: Delete a contact from the contact list.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the contact.

returns.name: success
returns.description: A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.

errors.name: UserPermissionError
errors.description: The user lacks permissions to delete the contact.

errors.name: EmergencyContactError
errors.description: The contact is the emergency contact.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'contact_id' is not found.

tools.name: SearchContacts
tools.summary: Search for contacts based on filters. If certain arguments are not provided, the corresponding filters are not applied.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the contact to search for.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email of the contact to search for.

parameters.name: remark
parameters.description: The remark of the contact to search for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of search results to return. Default is 5.

returns.name: contacts
returns.description: An array of contact objects containing contact information, each object includes 'contact_id', 'name', 'email', 'remark', and 'info'.

errors.name: MaxContactsExceededError
errors.description: The user has exceeded the maximum number of contacts allowed.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'limit' is negative or not an integer.

tools.name: DownloadAttachment
tools.summary: Download attachments using their ids.

parameters.name: attachment_ids
parameters.description: The unique identifiers of the attachments.

returns.name: attachment_paths
returns.description: The local file paths of the downloaded attachments.

error.name: UserPermissionError
error.description: The user lacks permissions to download the attachment.

error.name: FileSizeExceededError
error.description: The size of the attachment is too large.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: One or multiple 'attachment_ids' do not exist.

category: Productivity, Task Management, and Event Management Tools
description_for_model: Tool for managing Google Calendar events, including creating, deleting, updating, searching, setting reminders, and sharing the calendar with other users.
description_for_human: Tool for managing Google Calendar events.

tools.name: CreateOrUpdateEvent
tools.summary: Create a new event or update an existing event in the calendar.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the event to be updated. If not provided, a new event will be created.

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The name of the event. Required when creating a new event.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content of the event.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The start time of the event in ISO 8601 format. Required when creating a new event.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: The end time of the event in ISO 8601 format. Required when creating a new event.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone of the event, e.g. UTC-04:00.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the event.

parameters.name: attendees
parameters.description: An array of email addresses of the attendees.

parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: The recurrence of the event in Google Calendar format. For instance, use `RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;INTERVAL=1;BYDAY=MO` to set the event to repeat every week on Monday.

returns.name: event_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the created or updated event.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The start_time is later than the end_time, the format of start_time, end_time or recurrence is incorrect, or start_time, end_time and event_name are not provided when creating a new event.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The provided event_id does not exist.

tools.name: DeleteEvents
tools.summary: Delete a list of events from the calendar.

parameters.name: event_ids
parameters.description: The unique identifiers of the events to be deleted.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Indicates whether the events was successfully deleted.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: One or multiple 'event_ids' do not exist.

tools.name: ReadEvents
tools.summary: Read events by event_ids.

parameters.name: event_ids
parameters.description: An array of unique event identifiers to read events.

returns.name: event_details
returns.description: An array of objects, each containing the details of an event, including event_id, event_name, content, start_time, end_time, timezone, location, organizer, attendees, and recurrence.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: One or multiple 'event_ids' do not exist.

tools.name: SearchEvents
tools.summary: Search events by keywords, date range, or attendees. If certain arguments are not provided, the corresponding filters are not applied.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: A list of keywords to search for.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of the date range in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the date range in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: attendees
parameters.description: An array of email addresses of the attendees to search for.

returns.name: event_ids
returns.description: An array of unique identifiers of the searched events.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The start_date and end_date are not formatted correctly, or start_date is later than the end_date.

tools.name: SendInvitations
tools.summary: Send event invitations to attendees.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the event.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Indicates whether the invitations were successfully sent.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The event_id does not exist.

tools.name: SetReminder
tools.summary: Set or update a reminder for an event.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the event.

parameters.name: reminder_time
parameters.description: The reminder time in ISO 8601 format.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Indicates whether the reminder was successfully set.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The event_id does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The reminder_time is later than the event start_time.

tools.name: GetEventsFromSharedCalendar
tools.summary: Get events from other users' shared calendar.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email of the user who shared the calendar.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date to retrieve events in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date to retrieve events in ISO 8601 format.

returns.name: event_blocks
returns.description: An array of objects containing the event blocks without any details, each containing the event_name ('busy'), start_time, and end_time. It is an empty array if the user of the specified email address does not share their calendar.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The start_date and end_date are not formatted correctly, or start_date is later than the end_date.

category: Financial, Payment Gateway, and CRM Tools
description_for_model: A comprehensive toolkit for managing personal online banking tasks, such as viewing account information, transferring funds, searching for payees, paying bills, searching transaction history, and retriving statements.
description_for_human: Toolkit for managing personal online banking tasks.

tools.name: GetAccountInformation
tools.summary: Retrieve information (e.g., account number or balance) about an account that belongs to the User.

parameters.name: account_type
parameters.description: The account type, one of ['checking', 'savings', 'mutual fund TFSA', 'mutual fund non-registered', 'self-directed TFSA', 'self-directed non-registered', 'mortgage', 'credit_card'].

returns.name: accounts
returns.description: A list of objects containing information about accounts of the specified account type, including details like account number (in the format 'XXX-XXXX-XXXX'), type, balance, and status. Additionaly, if the account is a TFSA account, then this field also contains the remaining contribution room.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'account_type' parameter is not one of ['checking', 'savings', 'mutual fund TFSA', 'mutual fund non-registered', 'self-directed TFSA', 'self-directed non-registered', 'mortgage', 'credit_card'].

tools.name: TransferFunds
tools.summary: Transfer funds between two accounts.

parameters.name: from_account_number
parameters.description: The user's bank account number to transfer funds from, in the format 'XXX-XXXX-XXXX'.

parameters.name: to_account_number
parameters.description: The bank account number to transfer funds to, in the format 'XXX-XXXX-XXXX'.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount to transfer, must be positive.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the transfer was successful.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'from_account_number' or 'to_account_number' parameter is not in the correct format, the 'from_account_number' is not owned by the user, or the 'amount' parameter is not positive.

tools.name: SearchPayee
tools.summary: Search for a payee by keywords.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: A list of keywords to search for in the payee name.

returns.name: payees
returns.description: A list of dictionaries containing the payee_id (in the format 'P-XXXXXX') and payee_name of each matching payee.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'keywords' parameter is empty or contains invalid characters.

tools.name: PayBill
tools.summary: Pay a bill to a specified payee with your service acccount number.

parameters.name: from_account_number
parameters.description: The user's bank account number used for paying the bill in the format 'XXX-XXXX-XXXX'.

parameters.name: payee_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payee in the format 'P-XXXXXX'.

parameters.name: service_account_number
parameters.description: Your account number assigned by the service provider, which helps the provider identify transactions related to that specific customer.

parameters.name: payment_date
parameters.description: The date the payment should be paid, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount to pay, must be positive.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the bill payment was successful.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'from_account_number' parameter is not in the correct format, the 'from_account_number' is not owned by the user, the 'payee_id' is invalid, or the 'amount' parameter is not positive.

tools.name: GetAccountStatement
tools.summary: Retrieve an account statement for a specified period.

parameters.name: account_number
parameters.description: The user's bank account number in the format 'XXX-XXXX-XXXX'.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of the transaction history in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the transaction history in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Whether to download the statement as a CSV file. Default is false.

returns.name: transactions
returns.description: A list of dictionaries containing the date, description, amount, and balance of each transaction.

returns.name: statement_file_path
returns.description: The file path of the downloaded statement file. When 'download' is false, this is an empty string.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'account_number' parameter is not in the correct format, or the 'start_date' or 'end_date' parameter is not in the correct format.

tools.name: SearchTransactions
tools.summary: Search transactions by keyword or amount range. If certain arguments are not provided, the corresponding filters are not applied.

parameters.name: account_number
parameters.description: The account number in the format 'XXX-XXXX-XXXX'.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword to search for in the transaction description.

parameters.name: min_amount
parameters.description: The minimum transaction amount to search for.

parameters.name: max_amount
parameters.description: The maximum transaction amount to search for.

returns.name: transactions
returns.description: A list of dictionaries containing the date, description, amount, and balance of each matching transaction.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'account_number' parameter is not in the correct format, or the 'min_amount' and 'max_amount' parameters are not valid.

category: E-commerce, Online Service, and Marketplace Tools
description_for_model: An Amazon toolkit to perform common online shopping tasks like searching for products, viewing product details, managing the shopping cart and wish list, placing orders, and posting reviews. It also allows users to view their saved addresses and payment methods, and search their order history.
description_for_human: Toolkit for common online shopping tasks on Amazon.

tools.name: SearchProducts
tools.summary: Search for products based on keywords.

parameters.name: search_keywords
parameters.description: A list of keywords to search for in the product name.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of search results to return. Default is 5, maximum is 10.

returns.name: products
returns.description: A list of objects containing the keys 'product_id' (string), 'name' (string), 'description' (string) and 'price' (number). The 'product_id' is a unique identifier of the product.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'search_keywords' parameter is empty or contains invalid characters.

tools.name: GetProductDetails
tools.summary: Retrieve detailed information about a product.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the product.

returns.name: product_details
returns.description: An object containing 'name' (string), 'description' (string), 'price' (number), 'rating' (integer from 0 to 5), and 'reviews' (an array of objects, each object contains 'reviewer_name' (string), 'review_date' (string, format: 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'review_content' (string)).

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The product with the specified 'product_id' was not found.

tools.name: AddToCart
tools.summary: Add a product to the shopping cart.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the product.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The quantity of the product to add.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the addition was successful.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The product with the specified 'product_id' was not found.

exceptions.name: ConflictException
exceptions.description: The product is already in the cart.

tools.name: ViewCart
tools.summary: View the contents of the shopping cart.

returns.name: cart_contents
returns.description: A list of objects, each containing 'product_id' (string), 'product_name' (string), 'quantity' (integer), 'price' (number), and 'subtotal' (number, in USD).

returns.name: total_price
returns.description: The total price of the shopping cart, in USD.

tools.name: RemoveFromCart
tools.summary: Remove a list of products from the shopping cart entirely, regardless of the quantity.

parameters.name: product_ids
parameters.description: The unique identifiers of the products to remove.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the removal was successful.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: one or more of the products with the specified 'product_ids' was not found.

tools.name: PlaceOrder
tools.summary: Place an order for the products in the shopping cart, using the specified shipping address and payment method. The shopping cart is emptied after the order is placed.

parameters.name: shipping_address
parameters.description: The shipping address, containing 'name' (string), 'phone_number' (string) and 'address' (string).

parameters.name: payment_method
parameters.description: The payment method, containing 'card_number' (string), 'expiry_date' (string, format: 'MM/YY'), 'cvv' (string).

returns.name: order_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the placed order.

returns.name: total_price
returns.description: The total price of the order, in USD.

returns.name: order_contents
returns.description: A list of objects, each containing 'product_id' (string), 'product_name' (string), 'quantity' (integer) and 'subtotal' (string, in USD).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The fields in 'shipping_address' or 'payment_method' are invalid. Or the shopping cart is empty.

exceptions.name: AuthorizationException
exceptions.description: Payment authorization failed.

tools.name: SearchOrderHistory
tools.summary: Search the user's order history.

parameters.name: search_keywords
parameters.description: A list of keywords to search for in the order history.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of search results to return. Default is 10.

returns.name: orders
returns.description: A list of objects, each containing 'order_id', 'order_timestamp' (format: 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM:SS'), 'order_status' (one of ['pending', 'shipped', 'delivered']).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'search_keywords' parameter is empty or contains invalid characters.

tools.name: ViewOrderDetails
tools.summary: View the details of an order, including shipment and payment information.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the order.

returns.name: order_timestamp
returns.description: The time the order was placed. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM:SS'.

returns.name: order_status
returns.description: The status of the order, one of ['pending', 'shipped', 'delivered'].

returns.name: order_contents
returns.description: A list of objects, each containing 'product_id', 'product_name' and 'quantity'.

returns.name: shipment_details
returns.description: An object containing 'tracking_number', 'carrier', 'arrival_date' (for delivered orders) or 'estimated_arrival_date' (for pending or shipped orders), and 'shipping_address'.

returns.name: payment_details
returns.description: An object containing 'card_number', and 'amount_paid'.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The order with the specified 'order_id' was not found.

tools.name: ManageWishlist
tools.summary: Add, remove, or view items in the user's wish list.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to perform, one of ['add', 'remove', 'view'].

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the product, needed for 'add' and 'remove' actions.

returns.name: result
returns.description: An object containing 'success' (boolean) indicating whether the action was successful, and 'wishlist_contents' (array of objects, each object contains the product identifiers and name in the wishlist, only for 'view' action).

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The product with the specified 'product_id' was not found for 'remove' action.

exceptions.name: ConflictException
exceptions.description: The product is already in the wishlist for 'add' action.

tools.name: ViewSavedAddresses
tools.summary: View the user's saved addresses.

returns.name: addresses
returns.description: A list of objects, each containing 'remark', 'name', 'phone_number' and 'address'.

tools.name: ViewSavedPaymentMethods
tools.summary: View the user's saved payment methods.

returns.name: payment_methods
returns.description: A list of objects, each containing 'card_number', 'expiry_date', 'cvv'.

tools.name: PostReview
tools.summary: Post a review for a previous product that was purchased.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the product.

parameters.name: review
parameters.description: The public review to post.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the review was successfully posted.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The product with the specified 'product_id' was not found.

category: E-commerce, Online Service, and Marketplace Tools
description_for_model: A toolkit for searching, booking, and managing flights and accommodations. It enables search and book flights and accommodations, retrieve flight and accommodation details, search and manage existing reservations, and retrieve user saved travel and payment information.
description_for_human: Toolkit for searching, booking, and managing flights and accommodations.

tools.name: SearchFlights
tools.summary: Search for available flights based on origin, destination, and departure date. Optionally, return flights can be searched for by providing a return date.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: The departure location, should be a valid airport code or city name.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The arrival location, should be a valid airport code or city name.

parameters.name: departure_date
parameters.description: The departure date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: return_date
parameters.description: The return date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: travellers
parameters.description: An object containing fields adults (integer), children (integer), infants (integer).

parameters.name: travel_class
parameters.description: The travel class, possible values: 'economy', 'premium_economy', 'business', 'first_class'.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 5, maximum is 10.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: An object containing optional fields min_price (number), max_price (number), stops_filter (array of strings, each string is a allowed stop type, possible values: 'direct', '1_stop', '2_plus_stops'), airline (string), departure_time (string, one of ['morning', 'afternoon', 'evening']), arrival_time (string, one of ['morning', 'afternoon', 'evening']). Default is no filters.

returns.name: flight_options
returns.description: A list of objects, each object contains option_id (string, starts with 'outbound' or 'return'), airline (string), flight_numbers (array of strings), departure_airport (string, the airport code), departure_time (string, format: 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM'), arrival_airport (string, the airport code), arrival_time (string, format: 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM'), duration (string, format: 'HH:MM'), stops (integer), layovers (array of strings, each string is an airport code with the layover duration in format 'HH:MM'), price (number, in USD), additional_information (object, containing additional information such as baggage allowance, change fees, cancellation fees, etc.). At most `max_results` flights are returned.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'origin' or 'destination' is not a valid airport code or city name, or the 'departure_date' or 'return_date' is invalid, or the 'travellers' or 'travel_class' is invalid, or the 'max_results' is not an integer between 1 and 10, or the fields in 'filters' are invalid.

tools.name: GetFlightDetails
tools.summary: Retrieve detailed information for a specific flight using its unique number and departure date.

parameters.name: departure_date
parameters.description: The departure date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: flight_number
parameters.description: The flight number used to identify the flight, e.g. 'AC 123'.

returns.name: flight_details
returns.description: An object containing airline (string), departure_airport (string, the airport code), departure_time (string, format: 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM'), arrival_airport (string, the airport code), arrival_time (string, format: 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM'), duration (string, format: 'HH:MM'), aircraft_type (string), aircraft_age (integer).

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: 'flight_number' not found for 'departure_date'.

tools.name: SearchAccommodations
tools.summary: Search for available accommodations based on city, location, check-in date, check-out date, and guests.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The city of the accommodation.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the accommodation.

parameters.name: check_in_date
parameters.description: The check-in date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: check_out_date
parameters.description: The check-out date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: guests
parameters.description: An array of objects, each object contains adults (integer), children (integer).

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 5, maximum is 10.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: An object containing optional fields min_price (number), max_price (number), accommodation_type (string), room_type (string), min_rating (number), free_cancellation (boolean), free_breakfast (boolean), allow_smoking (boolean), allow_pets (boolean). Default is no filters.

returns.name: accommodation_options
returns.description: A list of objects, each object contains option_id (string, starts with 'acc'), name (string), address (string), rating (number), total_price (number, in USD), free_cancellation (boolean), free_breakfast (boolean), allow_smoking (boolean), allow_pets (boolean), additional_information (object, containing additional information such as amenities). At most `max_results` accommodations are returned.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'city' is not a valid city, or 'location' is not valid, or the 'check_in_date' and 'check_out_date' are invalid, or the 'guests' is invalid, or the 'max_results' is not an integer between 1 and 10, or the fields in 'filters' are invalid.

tools.name: Booking
tools.summary: Book flight or accommodation options using user-provided details and payment information.

parameters.name: option_ids
parameters.description: An non-empty array of unique identifiers of the options to book. The options must be of the same type, either all flights or all accommodations.

parameters.name: payment_method
parameters.description: An object containing payment information including card number, expiry date, and CVV.

parameters.name: travellers
parameters.description: An array of objects, each object contains name (string), date_of_birth (string, format: 'YYYY-MM-DD'), passport_number (string), passport_expiry_date (string, format: 'YYYY-MM-DD'). Only required for flight booking.

returns.name: booking_results
returns.description: An object indicates the booking results, including success (boolean). If success is true, the object also contains reservation_id (string), reservation_type (string, one of ['flight', 'accommodation']), total_price (number, in USD).

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: One or more of the 'option_ids' does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The options in 'option_ids' are not of the same type, or the 'option_ids' is empty, or payment information is invalid, or the 'travellers' parameter is not provided for flight booking, or there are invalid information in the 'travellers' parameter.

tools.name: SearchReservations
tools.summary: Search for existing flight or accommodation reservations based on reservation type, query string, start date, and end date. The query string is searched for in the reservation details.

parameters.name: reservation_type
parameters.description: The type of reservation, possible values: 'flight', 'accommodation'.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query string to search for in the reservation details.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of the reserved flight or accommodation in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the reserved flight or accommodation in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 5.

returns.name: reservations
returns.description: A list of objects, each object contains 'reservation_id' (string), 'booking_timestamp' (string, format: 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM:SS'), 'reservation_status' (string, one of ['confirmed', 'cancelled']), 'total_price' (number, in USD), 'refundable_amount' (number, in USD), 'additional_information' (object, containing additional information such as flight or accommodation details). At most `max_results` reservations are returned.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'reservation_type' is not one of ['flight', 'accommodation'], or the 'query' is empty, or the 'start_date' or 'end_date' is malformed, or the 'max_results' is not a positive integer.

tools.name: CancelReservations
tools.summary: Cancel a list of existing flight or accommodation reservation and process any applicable refunds.

parameters.name: reservation_ids
parameters.description: An array of unique identifiers of the reservations to cancel.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the cancellation was successful.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: One or more of the 'reservation_ids' does not exist.

exceptions.name: ConflictException
exceptions.description: At least one of the reservations in 'reservation_ids' is already cancelled.

tools.name: RetrieveSavedInformation
tools.summary: Retrieve user's saved payment methods or people information.

parameters.name: information_type
parameters.description: The type of information, must be one of ['payments', 'people'].

returns.name: retrieved_information
returns.description: If the 'information_type' is 'payments', the returned array contains objects, each object contains remark, card number, expiry date, and CVV. If the 'information_type' is 'people', the returned array contains objects, each object contains remark, name, date_of_birth, passport_number and passport_expiry_date.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'information_type' is not one of ['payments', 'people'].

category: Social Media and Content Management Tools
description_for_model: A toolkit for managing a Twitter account, enabling users to send, search, read, delete, and reply to tweets, as well as follow, unfollow, and interact with other users' tweets.
description_for_human: Toolkit for managing a Twitter account.

tools.name: PostTweet
tools.summary: Post a new tweet to the user's timeline.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content of the tweet, max length 280 characters.

parameters.name: media_paths
parameters.description: An optional list of media file paths to attach to the tweet, max 4 items. Each item must be a valid image or video file path in the local file system.

returns.name: tweet_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the posted tweet.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'content' parameter is too long, or the 'media_paths' parameter contains too many items, or at least one of the media files is not a valid image or video file.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: At least one of the media files does not exist in the local file system.

tools.name: SearchTweets
tools.summary: Search for user's own tweets or public tweets containing specific keywords or hashtags.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query string to search for in tweets.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return, default is 10.

parameters.name: own_tweets
parameters.description: Whether to search only the user's own tweets, default is false.

returns.name: tweets
returns.description: A list of objects containing the 'tweet_id', 'user_id', 'content', and 'timestamp' of each matching tweet.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'query' parameter is empty.

tools.name: ReadTweet
tools.summary: Read the content of a specific tweet by its ID.

parameters.name: tweet_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tweet to read.

returns.name: tweet
returns.description: An object containing the 'tweet_id', 'user_id', 'content', and 'timestamp' of the specified tweet.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'tweet_id' parameter is not found.

tools.name: DeleteTweets
tools.summary: Delete a tweet by its ID.

parameters.name: tweet_ids
parameters.description: An array of unique identifiers of the tweets to delete.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the tweet was successfully deleted.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: At least one of id in 'tweet_ids' parameter is not found.

tools.name: FollowUsers
tools.summary: Follow other users by their IDs.

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: An array of unique identifiers of the users to follow.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the users was successfully followed.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: At least one of id in 'user_ids' parameter is not found.

tools.name: UnfollowUsers
tools.summary: Unfollow other users by their IDs.

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: An array of unique identifiers of the users to unfollow.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the users were successfully unfollowed.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: At least one of id in 'user_ids' parameter is not found.

tools.name: GetUserProfile
tools.summary: Retrieve the user's own profile or another user's profile information by their ID.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user to retrieve the profile information for. If not provided, return own profile.

returns.name: profile
returns.description: An object containing the 'user_id', 'user_name', 'display_name', and 'bio' of the specified user.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'user_id' parameter is not found and not getting own profile.

tools.name: LikeTweet
tools.summary: Like a tweet by its ID.

parameters.name: tweet_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tweet to like.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the tweet was successfully liked.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'tweet_id' parameter is not found.

tools.name: UnlikeTweet
tools.summary: Undo like a tweet by its ID.

parameters.name: tweet_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tweet to undo like.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the tweet was successfully unliked.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'tweet_id' parameter is not found.

tools.name: Retweet
tools.summary: Retweet a tweet by its ID.

parameters.name: tweet_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tweet to retweet.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the tweet was successfully retweeted.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'tweet_id' parameter is not found.

tools.name: ReplyToTweet
tools.summary: Reply to a tweet by its ID.

parameters.name: tweet_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tweet to reply to.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content of the reply, max length 280 characters.

parameters.name: media_paths
parameters.description: An optional list of media file paths to attach to the tweet, max 4 items. Each item must be a valid image or video file path in the local file system.

returns.name: reply_tweet_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the posted reply tweet.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'content' parameter is too long, or the 'media_paths' parameter contains too many items, or at least one of the media files is not a valid image or video file.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'tweet_id' parameter is not found, or at least one of the media files does not exist in the local file system.

category: IoT, Smart Home, and Surveillance Tools
description_for_model: A toolkit for controlling and managing Google Home devices, enabling users to control smart home devices, play media, set reminders, ask questions, and retrieve device status and actions.
description_for_human: Toolkit for controlling and managing Google Home devices.

tools.name: SearchDevices
tools.summary: Searches for smart home devices connected to the user's Google Home.

parameters.name: device_type
parameters.description: The type of device to search for, e.g., 'light', 'thermostat', etc. If not specified, it returns all connected devices.

returns.name: devices
returns.description: A list of devices, each containing 'device_id', 'device_name', 'device_type', and 'device_status' (including its state, settings, etc).

tools.name: ListDeviceActions
tools.summary: Retrieves a list of possible actions that can be performed on a specified smart home device.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the smart home device.

returns.name: actions
returns.description: A list of possible actions for the device, each is an object containing 'action_name' (e.g., 'turn on', 'turn off', 'adjust temperature', etc), 'action_description', and 'action_parameters' (a detailed description of the parameters required for the action, with their types, descriptions, and constraints)

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'device_id' parameter is invalid or not supported.

tools.name: ControlDevice
tools.summary: Controls a specified smart home device by turning it on/off, adjusting its settings, or performing other actions. The available actions and parameters depend on the device type, which can be retrieved using 'ListDeviceActions'.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the smart home device to control.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to perform on the device, etc. Must match the actions returned by 'ListDeviceActions' for the specified device.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Additional parameters for the action. Must match the parameters returned by 'ListDeviceActions' for the specified device.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the action was successfully performed on the device.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'device_id' parameter is not found.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'action' or 'parameters' parameters are invalid or not supported.

tools.name: ScheduleDeviceAction
tools.summary: Schedules a specified smart home device to perform an action at a specified date and time.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the smart home device to schedule.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to perform on the device. Must match the actions returned by 'ListDeviceActions' for the specified device.

parameters.name: date_time
parameters.description: The scheduled date and time for the action, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Additional parameters for the action. Must match the parameters returned by 'ListDeviceActions' for the specified device.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the action was successfully scheduled.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'device_id' parameter is not found.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'action' or 'parameters' parameters are invalid or not supported, or the 'date_time' parameter format is incorrect, or the 'date_time' parameter is in the past.

tools.name: PlayMedia
tools.summary: Plays specified media (music, podcasts, etc.) on a connected device.

parameters.name: media
parameters.description: The media to play, e.g., a song title, podcast name, or radio station.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the device to play the media on. If not specified, it defaults to the Google Home device.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Additional parameters for the media. Must match the parameters returned by 'ListDeviceActions'.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the media was successfully played on the device.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'media' or 'device_id' parameter is not found.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'parameters' parameter is invalid or not supported.

tools.name: SetReminder
tools.summary: Sets a reminder for a specified date and time.

parameters.name: reminder_text
parameters.description: The text of the reminder.

parameters.name: date_time
parameters.description: The date and time for the reminder, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'.

returns.name: reminder_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the created reminder.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'date_time' parameter format is incorrect.

tools.name: ListReminders
tools.summary: Lists all reminders set on the user's Google Home.

returns.name: reminders
returns.description: A list of reminders, each containing 'reminder_id', 'reminder_text', and 'date_time'.

tools.name: AskQuestion
tools.summary: Asks a question and receives an answer from Google Home.

parameters.name: question
parameters.description: The question to ask.

returns.name: answer
returns.description: The answer to the question.

category: Cloud Storage and File Management Tools
description_for_model: A comprehensive toolkit for managing files and folders in Dropbox, including uploading, downloading, sharing, searching, and organizing content, as well as managing access permissions, creating and disabling shareable links.
description_for_human: Toolkit for managing files and folders in Dropbox.

tools.name: UploadFile
tools.summary: Upload a file from the local system to the user's Dropbox account.

parameters.name: local_file_path
parameters.description: The path of the file on the local system.

parameters.name: cloud_folder_path
parameters.description: The cloud folder path in the user's Dropbox account where the file will be uploaded. If not specified, the file will be uploaded to the root folder '/MyDropbox/'.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the file was successfully uploaded.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'local_file_path' is invalid or the 'cloud_folder_path' is invalid.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'local_file_path' does not exist or the 'cloud_folder_path' does not exist.

tools.name: DownloadFile
tools.summary: Download a file from the Dropbox to the local system. It could be a file uploaded by the user or a file shared with the user by others.

parameters.name: user_cloud_file_path
parameters.description: The cloud file path in the user's Dropbox account. Required for downloading a file uploaded by the user.

parameters.name: shared_file_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the shared file. Required for downloading a file shared with the user by others.

parameters.name: local_destination_folder
parameters.description: The path of the folder on the local system where the file will be downloaded; default: the default download folder of the local system.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the file was successfully downloaded.

returns.name: local_file_path
returns.description: The path of the downloaded file on the local system. Empty if the file was not successfully downloaded.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: neither 'user_cloud_file_path' nor 'shared_file_id' is specified, or the 'user_cloud_file_path' is invalid, or the 'shared_file_id' is invalid, or .

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'user_cloud_file_path' does not exist, or the 'shared_file_id' does not exist, or the 'shared_file_id' is not shared with the user, or the 'local_destination_folder' does not exist.

tools.name: ListFilesAndFolders
tools.summary: List files and folders in a given folder in the user's Dropbox account.

parameters.name: cloud_folder_path
parameters.description: The cloud folder path in the user's Dropbox account. If not specified, the root folder '/MyDropbox/' will be used.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of files and folders to return; default: 10.

returns.name: items
returns.description: An array of objects, each with 'id' (the unique identifier of the file or folder), 'name' (the name of the file or folder), and 'type' (the type of the item, either 'file' or 'folder').

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'cloud_folder_path' is invalid, or the 'max_results' is not a positive integer.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'cloud_folder_path' does not exist.

tools.name: CreateFolder
tools.summary: Create a folder in the cloud storage.

parameters.name: folder_name
parameters.description: The name of the new folder.

parameters.name: parent_folder_path
parameters.description: The cloud folder path in the user's Dropbox account where the new folder will be created. If not specified, the new folder will be created in the root folder '/MyDropbox/'.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the folder was successfully created.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'folder_name' is invalid or the 'parent_folder_path' does not exist.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'parent_folder_path' does not exist.

tools.name: ShareItem
tools.summary: Share a file or folder in user's Dropbox account with another user.

parameters.name: item_path
parameters.description: The cloud file or folder path in the user's Dropbox account to be shared.

parameters.name: recipient_email
parameters.description: The email address of the recipient.

parameters.name: access_level
parameters.description: The level of access granted to the recipient; valid values: 'view', 'comment', 'edit'.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the item was successfully shared.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'item_path' does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'recipient_email' is invalid or 'access_level' is not one of the valid values.

tools.name: DeleteItem
tools.summary: Delete a file or folder from the user's Dropbox account.

parameters.name: item_path
parameters.description: The cloud file or folder path in the user's Dropbox account to be deleted.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the file or folder was successfully deleted.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'item_path' does not exist.

tools.name: SearchItems
tools.summary: Search for files and folders by name or metadata in the user's Dropbox account.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of files and folders to return; default: 50.

returns.name: items
returns.description: An array of objects, each with 'id' (the unique identifier of the file or folder), 'path' (the path of the file or folder), and 'type' (the type of the item, either 'file' or 'folder').

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'query' is malformed.

tools.name: GetItemMetadata
tools.summary: Get metadata of a file or folder in the user's Dropbox account.

parameters.name: item_path
parameters.description: The cloud file or folder path in the user's Dropbox account.

returns.name: metadata
returns.description: An object with fields such as 'id' (the unique identifier of the file or folder), 'name' (the name of the file or folder), 'type' (the type of the item, either 'file' or 'folder'), 'size' (the size of the file in bytes), 'created_at' (the creation timestamp), 'modified_at' (the last modification timestamp), etc.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'item_path' does not exist.

tools.name: MoveItem
tools.summary: Move a file or folder to a different folder in the user's Dropbox account.

parameters.name: item_path
parameters.description: The cloud file or folder path in the user's Dropbox account to be moved.

parameters.name: destination_folder_path
parameters.description: The destination folder path in the user's Dropbox account.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the file or folder was successfully moved.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'item_path' or 'destination_folder_path' does not exist.

tools.name: CreateLink
tools.summary: Create a shareable link for a file or folder in the cloud storage.

parameters.name: item_path
parameters.description: The cloud file or folder path in the user's Dropbox account to be shared.

parameters.name: access_level
parameters.description: The level of access granted; valid values: 'view', 'comment', 'edit'.

returns.name: link
returns.description: The shareable link.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'item_path' does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'access_level' is not one of the valid values.

tools.name: DisableLink
tools.summary: Disable the shareable link for a file or folder in the cloud storage.

parameters.name: item_path
parameters.description: The cloud file or folder path in the user's Dropbox account to be unshared.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the link was successfully disabled.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'item_path' does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'item_path' is not a shared file or folder.

description_for_model: The Teladoc toolkit allows users to search for doctors, consult with doctors, schedule and manage appointments, access and update personal health records, request and manage prescriptions, securely communicate with doctors, and leave and view reviews for doctors.
description_for_human: Toolkit for online doctor consultation platform.

tools.name: SearchDoctors
tools.summary: Search for doctors based on keywords, specialty, location, and a specific date.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keywords to search doctors by, such as name or specialty.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location to filter doctors by.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date to check doctor's availability in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

returns.name: doctors
returns.description: A list of doctors with their respective unique identifiers, names, specialties, locations, and available time slots (list of start and end times in the format  'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM').

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'date' parameter is not in the correct format or the 'location' parameter is not valid.

tools.name: ConsultDoctor
tools.summary: Start a consultation with a doctor by providing the doctor's unique identifier and reason for consultation.

parameters.name: doctor_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the chosen doctor.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason for consultation (e.g., 'cold symptoms', 'allergy concerns').

returns.name: consultation_id
returns.description: A unique identifier for the consultation.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'doctor_id' parameter does not exist.

tools.name: ScheduleAppointment
tools.summary: Schedule an appointment with a doctor by providing the doctor's unique identifier, appointment date and time, and reason for appointment.

parameters.name: doctor_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the chosen doctor.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date of the appointment in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Time of the appointment in the format 'HH:mm'.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason for appointment (e.g., 'routine checkup', 'follow-up visit').

returns.name: appointment_id
returns.description: A unique identifier for the appointment if successfully scheduled, otherwise null.

returns.name: success
returns.description: A boolean indicating whether the appointment was successfully scheduled.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'doctor_id' parameter does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException

category: Social Media and Content Management Tools

It also allows users to search their own posts or other's posts by keyword. The toolkit provides functionalities for creating, reading, updating, and deleting posts and comments, sending messages, and searching for friends and posts.

category: Productivity, Task Management, and Event Management Tools

category: Financial, Payment Gateway, and CRM Tools
description_for_model: The Venmo toolkit allows users to perform various operations related to mobile payment services, such as sending money, requesting money, handling requests, checking balance, adding money, withdrawing money, viewing transaction history, viewing friends list, searching users, and listing linked bank accounts.
description_for_human: Toolkit for managing mobile payment services.

tools.name: SendMoney
tools.summary: Send money to another Venmo user.

parameters.name: recipient_username
parameters.description: The username of the recipient.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of money to send, must be positive.

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: A note to include with the payment. Default is an empty string.

returns.name: result
returns.description: An object containing 'success' (boolean, indicates whether the transaction was successful), 'transaction_id' (string, the unique identifier of the transaction, if successful), and 'error_message' (string, if unsuccessful).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'amount' is negative or exceeds the user's balance.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'recipient_username' does not exist.

tools.name: RequestMoney
tools.summary: Request money from another Venmo user. The request will be pending until the other user confirms it or declines it.

parameters.name: requestee_username
parameters.description: The username of the person from whom money is being requested.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of money to request, must be positive.

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: A note to include with the request. Default is an empty string.

returns.name: result
returns.description: An object containing 'success' (boolean, indicates whether the transaction was successful), 'transaction_id' (string, the unique identifier of the transaction, if successful), and 'error_message' (string, if unsuccessful).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'amount' is negative.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'requestee_username' does not exist.

tools.name: HandleRequest
tools.summary: Confirm or decline a pending request.

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to take, either 'confirm' or 'decline'.

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: A note to include with the confirmation or decline. Default is an empty string.

returns.name: result
returns.description: An object containing 'success' (boolean, indicates whether the transaction was successful), and 'error_message' (string, if unsuccessful).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'action' is not 'confirm' or 'decline', or the transaction is not a pending request, or the user is the starter of the transaction.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'transaction_id' does not exist.

tools.name: CheckBalance
tools.summary: Check the User's Venmo balance.

returns.name: balance
returns.description: The User's current Venmo balance.

tools.name: AddMoney
tools.summary: Add money to the User's Venmo balance from a linked bank account.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of money to add, must be positive.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the linked bank account.

returns.name: result
returns.description: An object containing 'success' (boolean, indicates whether the transaction was successful), 'transaction_id' (string, the unique identifier of the transaction, if successful), and 'error_message' (string, if unsuccessful).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'amount' is negative.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'account_id' does not exist.

tools.name: WithdrawMoney
tools.summary: Withdraw money from the user's Venmo balance to a linked bank account.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of money to withdraw, must be positive.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the linked bank account.

returns.name: result
returns.description: An object containing 'success' (boolean, indicates whether the transaction was successful), 'transaction_id' (string, the unique identifier of the transaction, if successful), and 'error_message' (string, if unsuccessful).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'amount' is negative or exceeds the user's balance.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'account_id' does not exist.

tools.name: SearchTransactions
tools.summary: Search the user's transactions including sends, requests, adds, and withdraws. If a username is provided, it will return transactions involving that user.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the other user involved in the transactions. Default is an empty string.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query. Default is list all transactions.

parameters.name: transaction_type
parameters.description: The type of transactions to return. Default is 'all', can be 'send', 'request', 'add', or 'withdraw'.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of transactions to return. Default is 5, maximum is 10.

returns.name: transactions
returns.description: An array of transactions, each is an object containing 'transaction_id' (string), 'type' (send, request, add, withdraw), 'date' (in the format 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ'), 'amount' (number), 'note' (string, for send and request transactions), 'status' (string, for request transactions), 'is_starter' (boolean, indicate whether the user is the starter of the transaction, for send and request transactions), 'other_user' (string, the username of the other user, for send and request transactions), 'account_id' (string, the unique identifier of the linked bank account, for add and withdraw transactions).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'username' does not exist.

tools.name: ViewFriendsList
tools.summary: View the user's friends list.

returns.name: friends
returns.description: An array of objects, each containing 'username' (string, the username of the friend), 'display_name' (string, the display name of the friend) and 'profile_picture_url' (string, the url of the profile picture of the friend, only when the friend has set a profile picture).

tools.name: SearchUsers
tools.summary: Search for other Venmo users.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query.

returns.name: users
returns.description: An array of objects, each containing 'username' (string, the username of the user), 'display_name' (string, the display name of the user) and 'profile_picture_url' (string, the url of the profile picture of the user, only when the user has set a profile picture).

tools.name: ListLinkedAccounts
tools.summary: View the user's linked bank accounts.

returns.name: accounts
returns.description: An array of objects, each containing 'account_id' (the unique identifier of the linked bank account), 'bank_name' (the name of the bank), 'account_type' (the type of the account, e.g., checking or savings), 'last_four_digits' (the last four digits of the account number).

description_for_model: A toolkit that allows users to generate and manipulate deepfake video and audio content, and verify if a given media is a deepfake or not.

description_for_model: Used for accessing and visualizing user's genetic information, generating personalized health recommendations, managing data privacy, and facilitating data sharing with third-party applications. It also supports data download, update, deletion, and comparison.

tools.name: GetHealthRecommendations

exceptions.name: NotFoundException

description_for_model: A toolkit for interacting with Google Search, providing functionalities such as performing web, image, video, and news searches, accessing search trends, and retrieving the user's search history. It also allows applying various filters to the search and performing advanced search with various options.
description_for_human: Toolkit for interacting with Google Search.

tools.name: WebSearch
tools.summary: Perform a web search on Google with a given keyword or phrase and return the search results.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword or phrase to search.

parameters.name: num_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: The filters to apply, includes 'time_range' (string, in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD..YYYY-MM-DD'), 'language' (string, in the format of ISO 639-1 language code), and 'region' (string, in the format of ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code).

returns.name: results
returns.description: The search results, each includes 'title', 'snippet', and 'url' (string, the unique identifier of the search result).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'keyword' is empty or the 'num_results' is not a positive integer.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: No search results are found.

tools.name: ImageSearch
tools.summary: Perform an image search on Google with a given keyword or phrase and return the search results.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword or phrase to search.

parameters.name: num_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: The filters to apply, includes 'time_range' (string, in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD..YYYY-MM-DD'), 'language' (string, in the format of ISO 639-1 language code), and 'region' (string, in the format of ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code).

returns.name: results
returns.description: The search results, each includes 'title', 'url' (string, the unique identifier of the search result), 'size', 'format' and 'source'.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'keyword' is empty or the 'num_results' is not a positive integer.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: No search results are found.

tools.name: VideoSearch
tools.summary: Perform a video search on Google with a given keyword or phrase and return the search results.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword or phrase to search.

parameters.name: num_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: The filters to apply, includes 'time_range' (string, in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD..YYYY-MM-DD'), 'language' (string, in the format of ISO 639-1 language code), and 'region' (string, in the format of ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code).

returns.name: results
returns.description: The search results, each includes 'title', 'url' (string, the unique identifier of the search result), 'duration', and 'format'.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'keyword' is empty or the 'num_results' is not a positive integer.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: No search results are found.

tools.name: NewsSearch
tools.summary: Perform a news search on Google with a given keyword or phrase and return the search results.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword or phrase to search.

parameters.name: num_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: The filters to apply, includes 'time_range' (string, in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD..YYYY-MM-DD'), 'language' (string, in the format of ISO 639-1 language code), and 'region' (string, in the format of ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code).

returns.name: results
returns.description: The search results, each includes 'title', 'snippet', 'url' (string, the unique identifier of the search result), and 'source'.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'keyword' is empty or the 'num_results' is not a positive integer.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: No search results are found.

tools.name: GetSearchTrends
tools.summary: Access the search trends on Google.

parameters.name: time_range
parameters.description: The time range to get the search trends, in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD..YYYY-MM-DD'. Default is the past 7 days.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location to get the search trends, in the format of ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. Default is not restricted to a specific location and shows global trends.

returns.name: trends
returns.description: The search trends, each is an object includes 'keyword', 'search_volume', and 'increase_percentage'.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'time_range' is invalid or the 'location' is invalid.

tools.name: GetSearchHistory
tools.summary: Retrieve the user's search history.

parameters.name: time_range
parameters.description: The time range to get the search history, in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD..YYYY-MM-DD'. Default is the past 7 days.

returns.name: history
returns.description: The user's search history, each includes 'keyword', 'time' (in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM:SS'), and 'type' (one of ['web', 'image', 'video', 'news']).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'time_range' is invalid.

description_for_model: A toolkit that provides functionalities of a web browser, including navigating to a URL, retrieving elements matching a CSS selector, retrieving the element details, inputting text into an input field, clicking hyperlinks or buttons, and searching the browsing history. It also allows users to perform web browsing tasks such as filling out forms, downloading files, and clicking on hyperlinks or buttons.
description_for_human: Toolkit for web browsing tasks.

tools.name: NavigateTo
tools.summary: Navigates to a specified URL.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to navigate to.

returns.name: snippet
returns.description: The snippet of the current webpage.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The provided URL is not valid.

tools.name: RetrieveElements
tools.summary: Retrieves elements in the current web page matching the given CSS selector.

parameters.name: css_selectors
parameters.description: The list of CSS selectors to match, each is a string.

returns.name: retrieve_results
returns.description: A list of array, each array contains elements matching the corresponding CSS selector, each element is an object includes 'id', 'tag_name', 'text'.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: There is no current webpage.

tools.name: GetElementsDetails
tools.summary: Retrieves the details of a list of elements in the current web page.

parameters.name: element_ids
parameters.description: The ids of the element.

returns.name: element_details
returns.description: The details of the elements, each includes 'id', 'tag_name', 'text', 'attributes' and other possible fields.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
