tools.name: QueryEthereumData
tools.summary: Query Ethereum blockchain data, including account and contract addresses, account balances, and transaction information.

parameters.name: query_type
parameters.description: The type of data to query; should be one of ['addresses' (includes contract addresses), 'address info', or 'transaction hash']. Addresses may be searched using a prefix or contract name, which may return multiple addresses. Address info and transaction hashes must be queried using an exact address or hash.

parameters.name: query_value
parameters.description: The value to query (e.g., address or transaction hash).

returns.name: query_result
returns.description: The result of the query in a human-readable format. Will be either a list of addresses, address info (including a balance, in wei, for EOAs, or contract info for contracts), or transaction information (including any events emitted and whether it was successful / confirmed).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The query_type or query_value are invalid.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The queried data does not exist.

description_for_model: A toolkit for managing cryptocurrency trading activities on the Binance platform, including account management, placing and managing orders, accessing real-time price information, setting price alerts, and viewing order and trade history.
description_for_human: Toolkit for managing cryptocurrency trading activities on the Binance platform.

tools.name: GetAccountBalances
tools.summary: Retrieve the user's account balances for various cryptocurrencies.

returns.name: balances
returns.description: An array of objects containing 'currency' (string, one of ['USD', 'BTC', 'ETH', etc.]) and 'available_balance' (number).

tools.name: RetrieveAccounts
tools.summary: Retrieves user's saved bank accounts for fiat deposits.

returns.name: accounts
returns.description: An array of object containing 'account_id' (string), 'account_number' (string), 'bank_name' (string), and 'account_type' (string, one of ['checking', 'savings']), representing the user's saved bank accounts.

tools.name: Deposit
tools.summary: Deposit a specified amount of fiat money to the user's saved account. The account id must be retrieved using the RetrieveAccounts tool.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency to deposit, one of ['USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', etc.].

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of fiat money to deposit.

parameters.name: from_account_id
parameters.description: The user's saved bank account id to deposit funds from.

returns.name: transaction_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the deposit transaction.

returns.name: status
returns.description: The status of the deposit transaction.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The currency is malformed or empty, or the amount is invalid.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The from_account_id does not exist.

tools.name: Withdraw
tools.summary: Withdraw a specified amount of cryptocurrency or fiat money to a specified destination address or bank account from user's account. The bank account id must be retrieved using the RetrieveAccounts tool.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency to withdraw, one of ['USD', 'BTC', 'ETH', etc.].

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of cryptocurrency to withdraw.

parameters.name: destination_address
parameters.description: The suitable blockchain address for withdrawing the cryptocurrency, which must be a complete and valid legacy Bitcoin address or SegWit address.

parameters.name: to_account_id
parameters.description: The user's saved bank account id to withdraw fiat money to.

returns.name: transaction_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the withdrawal transaction.

returns.name: status
returns.description: The status of the withdrawal transaction.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The currency is malformed or empty, or the amount is not positive, the destination_address is incomplete, or the destination_address is not a valid Bitcoin address or SegWit address.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The to_account_id does not exist.

tools.name: PlaceOrder
tools.summary: Place a buy or sell order for a specified cryptocurrency pair.

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: The cryptocurrency pair to trade, for example, 'BTCUSD', 'USDBTC', 'ETHUSD', etc. The first currency in the pair is the base currency, and the second currency is the quote currency.

parameters.name: order_type
parameters.description: The order type, one of ['limit', 'market']. 'limit' orders are executed at a specified price or better, while 'market' orders are executed at the best available price.

parameters.name: side
parameters.description: The side of the trade, one of ['buy', 'sell'].

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The quantity of the cryptocurrency to trade.

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: The price of the cryptocurrency to trade, optional for market orders.

returns.name: order_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the placed order.

returns.name: status
returns.description: The status of the placed order.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'pair' is not valid, or the 'order_type' or 'side' are not one of the specified values, or the 'quantity' or 'price' are invalid.

tools.name: ModifyOrder
tools.summary: Modify an existing order by changing its price or quantity.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the order to modify.

parameters.name: new_price
parameters.description: The new price of the order.

parameters.name: new_quantity
parameters.description: The new quantity of the order.

returns.name: modified_order_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the modified order.

returns.name: status
returns.description: The status of the modified order.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'new_price' or 'new_quantity' are invalid.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The specified order_id does not exist.

tools.name: CancelOrder
tools.summary: Cancel an existing order.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the order to cancel.

returns.name: status
returns.description: The status of the canceled order.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The specified order_id does not exist.

tools.name: GetRealTimePrice
tools.summary: Retrieve real-time price information for a specified cryptocurrency pair.

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: The cryptocurrency pair to retrieve real-time price information for, for example, 'BTCUSD', 'USDBTC', 'ETHUSD', etc.

returns.name: price
returns.description: Price of first currency in a pair in units of the second currency.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'pair' is not valid.

tools.name: GetOrderHistory
tools.summary: Retrieve the user's order history for a specified date range and cryptocurrency pair.

parameters.name: date_range
parameters.description: An array containing the start and end dates of the date range, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: The cryptocurrency pair to retrieve order history for, for example, 'BTCUSD', 'USDBTC', 'ETHUSD', etc. If not provided, retrieve order history for all pairs.

returns.name: orders
returns.description: An array of objects containing 'order_id' (string), 'pair' (string), 'side' (string), 'order_type' (string), 'price' (number), 'quantity' (number), 'timestamp' (string), and 'status' (string).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'date_range' is invalid, or the 'pair' is not valid.

tools.name: GetTradeHistory
tools.summary: Retrieve the user's trade history for a specified date range and cryptocurrency pair.

parameters.name: date_range
parameters.description: An array containing the start and end dates of the date range, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: The cryptocurrency pair to retrieve trade history for, for example, 'BTCUSD', 'USDBTC', 'ETHUSD', etc.

returns.name: trades
returns.description: An array of objects containing 'trade_id' (string), 'pair' (string), 'side' (string), 'price' (number), 'quantity' (number), and 'timestamp' (string, format 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS')

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'date_range' is invalid, or the 'pair' is not valid.

description_for_model: A comprehensive toolkit for managing Shopify stores, including product, order, and customer management, as well as store analytics.
description_for_human: Toolkit for managing Shopify stores.

tools.name: SearchProducts
tools.summary: Search for products by keywords or filters. If no products match the search query, return an empty list.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Keywords or filters to search for products.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default is 5, maximum is 10.

returns.name: products
returns.description: List of products matching the search query, each is an object containing product_id (string), name (string) price (number, in USD) and description (string).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'query' parameter is empty or the 'max_results' parameter is not an integer between 1 and 10.

tools.name: GetProductDetails
tools.summary: Retrieve product details by the product ID.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the product.

returns.name: name
returns.description: Name of the product.

returns.name: description
returns.description: Description of the product.

returns.name: price
returns.description: Price of the product, in USD.

returns.name: inventory
returns.description: Inventory of the product.

returns.name: extra_details
returns.description: Extra details of the product.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'product_id' does not exist.

tools.name: CreateProduct
tools.summary: Create a new product with the specified information.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the product.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the product.

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: Price of the product, in USD.

parameters.name: inventory
parameters.description: Inventory of the product.

parameters.name: extra_details
parameters.description: Extra details of the product.

returns.name: result
returns.description: Result of the product creation, including 'success' (boolean, indicates whether the product creation was successful) and 'product_id' (string, the unique identifier of the created product, if success is True).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'price' or 'inventory' is negative.

tools.name: UpdateProduct
tools.summary: Update product information by the product ID.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the product.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: New name of the product.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: New description of the product.

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: New price of the product, in USD.

parameters.name: inventory
parameters.description: New inventory of the product.

parameters.name: extra_details
parameters.description: New extra details of the product.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Indicates whether the product update was successful.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'price' or 'inventory' is negative.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'product_id' does not exist.

tools.name: DeleteProduct
tools.summary: Delete a product by the product ID.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the product.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Indicates whether the product deletion was successful.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'product_id' does not exist.

tools.name: SearchOrders
tools.summary: Search for orders by keywords or filters. If no orders match the search query, return an empty list.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Keywords or filters to search for orders.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default is 5, maximum is 10.

returns.name: orders
returns.description: List of orders matching the search query, each is an object containing order_id (string), customer_username (string), items (array of objects, each contains item name, quantity and subtotal), total_price (number, in USD), and status (string, one of ['draft', 'open', 'pending', 'paid', 'fulfilled', 'cancelled', 'refunded']).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'query' parameter is empty or the 'max_results' parameter is not an integer between 1 and 10.

tools.name: GetOrderDetails
tools.summary: Retrieve order details by the order ID.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the order.

returns.name: customer_username
returns.description: Username of the customer who placed the order.

returns.name: items
returns.description: List of items in the order, each is an object containing product_id (string), product_name (string), quantity (integer) and subtotal (number, in USD).

returns.name: total_price
returns.description: Total price of the order, in USD.

returns.name: shipping_details
returns.description: Shipping details of the order, including shipping_address (string), shipping_method (string, one of ['USPS', 'UPS', 'FedEx', 'DHL', 'others']), and shipping_date (string, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD').

returns.name: status
returns.description: Status of the order that visible to the customer, one of ['draft', 'open', 'pending', 'paid', 'fulfilled', 'cancelled', 'refunded'].

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'order_id' does not exist.

tools.name: DraftOrder
tools.summary: Draft a new order for a customer to review before payment. The drafted order would be in the 'draft' status.

parameters.name: customer_username
parameters.description: Username of the customer who will review the order.

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: List of items in the order, each is an object containing product_id (string), quantity (integer) and subtotal (number, in USD).

parameters.name: total_price
parameters.description: Total price of the order, in USD.

parameters.name: shipping_details
parameters.description: Shipping details of the order, including shipping_address (string), shipping_method (string, one of ['USPS', 'UPS', 'FedEx', 'DHL', 'others']), and shipping_date (string, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD').

returns.name: result
returns.description: Result of the order creation, including 'success' (boolean, indicates whether the order creation was successful) and 'order_id' (string, the unique identifier of the created order, if success is True).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The quantity of one of the 'items' is not positive, or the 'total_price' is negative, or the 'shipping_method' is not one of the specified options, or the 'shipping_date' is not in the correct format.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'customer_username' does not exist, or one of the 'items' does not exist.

tools.name: ManageOrder
tools.summary: Manage an existing order by the order ID. The action can be 'update', 'fulfill', 'cancel', or 'refund'. For 'update', the order details can be changed, can only be performed on orders in 'draft', 'open', or 'pending' status. The 'fulfill' action applies on a 'paid' order and changes the status to 'fulfilled'. The 'cancel' action cannot be performed on a 'cancelled' or 'refunded' order. The 'refund' action applies on a 'fulfilled' order and changes the status to 'refunded'.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the order.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to perform on the order, one of ['update', 'fulfill', 'cancel', 'refund'].

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: List of items in the order, each is an object containing product_id (string), quantity (integer) and subtotal (number, in USD). Only allowed for 'update' action.

parameters.name: total_price
parameters.description: New total price of the order, in USD. Only allowed for 'update' action.

parameters.name: shipping_details
parameters.description: New shipping details of the order, including shipping_address (string), shipping_method (string, one of ['USPS', 'UPS', 'FedEx', 'DHL', 'others']), and shipping_date (string, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'). Only allowed for 'update' action.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Indicates whether the order management was successful.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The action is not one of the specified options, the 'items', 'total_price', or 'shipping_details' parameter is provided for an action other than 'update', or the order is not in the correct status for the specified action, or the quantity of one of the 'items' is not positive, or the 'total_price' is negative, or the 'shipping_method' is not one of the specified options, or the 'shipping_date' is not in the correct format.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'order_id' does not exist.

tools.name: SearchCustomers
tools.summary: Search for customers by keywords or filters. If no customers match the search query, return an empty list.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Keywords or filters to search for customers.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default is not limited.

returns.name: customers
returns.description: List of customers matching the search query, each is an object containing username, fullname, email, and address.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'query' parameter is empty or the 'max_results' parameter is not an integer between 1 and 10.

tools.name: GetStoreAnalytics
tools.summary: Retrieve store analytics data, such as revenue, orders, and traffic.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date of the analytics data in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date of the analytics data in YYYY-MM-DD format.

returns.name: analytics_data
returns.description: Analytics data including revenue, orders, and traffic for the specified date range.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'start_date' or 'end_date' parameter is not in the correct format or the date range is invalid.

description_for_model: The FedExShipManager toolkit provides functionalities for automating shipping processes, including getting a quote for shipping a package, creating a shipping label, tracking and managing a shipment. It also supports searching for existing shipments and retrieving saved addresses.
description_for_human: Toolkit for automating shipping processes.

tools.name: GetQuote
tools.summary: Get a quote for shipping a package.

parameters.name: package_details
parameters.description: The package details, must include the keys 'description' (string), 'weight' (number, in grams), and 'dimensions' (string, h*w*d in cm).

parameters.name: sender_information
parameters.description: The sender information, including full name, address and contact number. The address and contact number must be valid.

parameters.name: recipient_information
parameters.description: The recipient information, including full name, address and contact number. The address and contact number must be valid.

parameters.name: pickup_time
parameters.description: The desired pickup time with format 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM:SS'.

parameters.name: special_handling
parameters.description: The desired special handling, one or more of ['signature_required', 'fragile', 'oversized', 'dangerous_goods', 'temperature_sensitive'].

returns.name: quote_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the shipping quote.

returns.name: shipping_quote
returns.description: An object containing the shipping quote details, for each possible shipping method (one of ['ground', 'express', 'overnight', '2-day']), including the shipping cost (number, in USD) and estimated delivery date (string, format 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM:SS').

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The package details, sender's information or recipient information are invalid, or the pickup time is invalid or too soon, or the special handling is invalid.

tools.name: CreateShipmentLabel
tools.summary: Creates a shipping label for a package.

parameters.name: quote_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the shipping quote.

parameters.name: shipping_method
parameters.description: The desired shipping method, one of ['ground', 'express', 'overnight', '2-day'].

returns.name: shipment_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the shipment.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The quote id does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The shipping method is not a valid option for the quote.

tools.name: GetShipmentDetails
tools.summary: Displays the current status, estimated delivery date, and other details of a shipment.

parameters.name: shipment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the shipment to be tracked.

returns.name: shipment_status
returns.description: The current status of the shipment, including a status, detailed description and timestamp (with the format 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM:SS'). The status name is one of ['pending', 'in_transit', 'delivered'].

returns.name: sender_information
returns.description: The sender information, including full name, address and contact number. The address and contact number must be valid.

returns.name: recipient_information
returns.description: The recipient information, including full name, address and contact number. The address and contact number must be valid.

returns.name: dates
returns.description: The dates of the shipment, including the pickup date, actual pickup date, estimated delivery date, and actual delivery date (if applicable). All dates are in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM:SS'.

returns.name: package_details
returns.description: The details of the package, including its weight and dimensions.

returns.name: shipping_method
returns.description: The desired shipping method, one of ['ground', 'international', 'overnight', '2-day'].

returns.name: special_handling
returns.description: The desired special handling, one or more of ['signature_required', 'fragile', 'oversized', 'dangerous_goods', 'temperature_sensitive'].

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The shipment id does not exist.

tools.name: ManageShipment
tools.summary: Manages shipments, including redirecting, rescheduling pickup, returning to sender, and cancelling.

parameters.name: shipment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the shipment.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: The operation to be performed, can only be one of ['cancel', 'reschedule_pickup', 'redirect', 'return_to_sender']. 'cancel' and 'reschedule_pickup' operations can only be performed when the status of the shipment is 'pending'. 'redirect' and 'return_to_sender' operations can only be performed when the status of the shipment is 'in_transit'.

parameters.name: new_receipient_information
parameters.description: The new recipient information, including full name, address and contact number, required for redirect operation.

parameters.name: new_pickup_time
parameters.description: The new pickup time, required for reschedule operation, with format 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM:SS'.

returns.name: operation_status
returns.description: Whether the operation was successful.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The shipment id is invalid, or the operation is not one of ['cancel', 'reschedule_pickup', 'redirect', 'return_to_sender'], or the operation is invalid under the current status of the shipment, or the new recipient information is invalid, or the new pickup time is invalid or too soon.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The shipment id does not exist.

tools.name: SearchShipment
tools.summary: Searches for User's existing shipments.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The term to search for in the shipment details.

returns.name: shipments
returns.description: The shipments that match the search term, each shipment is an object containing the shipment id and shipment status.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The search term is invalid.

tools.name: SearchSavedAddresses
tools.summary: Searches for user's saved addresses and contact numbers.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The term to search for in the address details.

returns.name: addresses
returns.description: A list of objects, each containing remark, full name, address and contact number.

description_for_model: An inventory management system that streamlines the process of tracking and managing stock levels, order fulfillment, and product demand. It allows adding, updating, and deleting items, searching for items, tracking inventory levels, setting up alerts for specific items or categories, searching for suppliers, and listing available categories.
description_for_human: Toolkit for managing inventory and stock levels.

tools.name: AddItem
tools.summary: Add a new item to the inventory.

parameters.name: item_name
parameters.description: The name of the item, must be a non-empty string.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category of the item, must be a non-empty string.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The quantity of the item, must be a positive integer.

parameters.name: supplier
parameters.description: The supplier of the item, must be a non-empty string if provided.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the item, must be a non-empty string if provided.

returns.name: item_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the added item.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'item_name', 'category', or 'quantity' parameter is invalid.

tools.name: UpdateItem
tools.summary: Update an existing item in the inventory.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the item, must be a non-empty string.

parameters.name: item_name
parameters.description: The new name of the item, must be a non-empty string if provided.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The new category of the item, must be a non-empty string if provided.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The new quantity of the item, must be a positive integer if provided.

parameters.name: supplier
parameters.description: The new supplier of the item, must be a non-empty string if provided.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The new description of the item, must be a non-empty string if provided.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the item update was successful.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'item_id' parameter is invalid.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'item_id' does not exist.

tools.name: DeleteItem
tools.summary: Delete an item from the inventory.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the item, must be a non-empty string.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the item deletion was successful.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'item_id' parameter is invalid.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'item_id' does not exist.

tools.name: SearchItems
tools.summary: Search for items in the inventory by keyword or category.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword to search for in the item name, must be a non-empty string if provided.

parameters.name: category

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve, must be a positive integer if provided. Default is 1.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of results per page, must be a positive integer if provided. Default is 10.

returns.name: items
returns.description: A list of objects containing the 'item_id', 'item_name', 'category', and 'quantity' of each matching item.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'page' or 'results_per_page' parameter is not a positive integer.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: No items are found.

tools.name: GetItemDetails
tools.summary: Get detailed information about an item in the inventory.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the item, must be a non-empty string.

returns.name: item_name
returns.description: The name of the item.

returns.name: category
returns.description: The category of the item.

returns.name: quantity
returns.description: The quantity of the item.

returns.name: supplier
returns.description: The supplier of the item.

returns.name: description
returns.description: The description of the item.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'item_id' parameter is invalid.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'item_id' does not exist.

tools.name: TrackInventory
tools.summary: Track inventory levels and receive notifications when stock levels are low.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: The stock level threshold, must be a positive integer.

returns.name: low_stock_items
returns.description: A list of objects containing the 'item_id', 'item_name', 'category', and 'quantity' of each item with stock levels below the threshold.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'threshold' parameter is not a positive integer.

tools.name: SetupAlert
tools.summary: Set up an alert for a specific item or category when the stock reaches a certain threshold.

parameters.name: alert_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the alert, must be a non-empty string if provided.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the item, must be a non-empty string if provided.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category of the item, must be a non-empty string if provided.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: The stock level threshold, must be a positive integer.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: The operation to perform on the alert, must be one of ['add', 'update', 'delete'].

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the alert setup was successful.

returns.name: alert_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the alert.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'operation' parameter is not one of the allowed values or the 'threshold' parameter is not a positive integer.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'alert_id' does not exist (for update and delete operations).

tools.name: SearchSuppliers
tools.summary: Search for suppliers by keyword.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword to search for in the supplier name, must be a non-empty string if provided.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve, must be a positive integer if provided. Default is 1.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of results per page, must be a positive integer if provided. Default is 10.

returns.name: suppliers
returns.description: A list of objects containing the 'supplier_id', 'supplier_name', and 'item_count' of each matching supplier.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'page' or 'results_per_page' parameter is not a positive integer.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: No suppliers are found.

tools.name: ListCategories
tools.summary: List available categories in the inventory.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve, must be a positive integer if provided. Default is 1.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of results per page, must be a positive integer if provided. Default is 10.

returns.name: categories
returns.description: A list of objects containing the 'category_id', 'category_name', and 'item_count' of each available category.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'page' or 'results_per_page' parameter is not a positive integer.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: No categories are found.

description_for_model: The CiscoUmbrella toolkit provides a suite of tools for managing a cloud security platform. It allows users to block and unblock domains, search for and analyze threats, manage security policies, search for and analyze security logs, and generate security reports.
description_for_human: Toolkit for managing a cloud security platform.

tools.name: BlockDomain
tools.summary: Block access to a specific domain.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain to be blocked.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the domain was successfully blocked.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'domain' argument is not a valid domain.

tools.name: UnblockDomain
tools.summary: Unblock access to a specific domain.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain to be unblocked.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the domain was successfully unblocked.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'domain' argument is not a valid domain.

tools.name: VerifyDomain
tools.summary: Verify a domain by checking if it is safe.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain to be verified.

returns.name: is_safe
returns.description: Whether the domain is safe.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'domain' argument is not a valid domain.

tools.name: SearchThreats
tools.summary: Search for potential threats based on a keyword or domain.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword or domain to search for threats.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10.

returns.name: threats
returns.description: A list of objects, each object contains 'threat_id' (string), 'domain' (string), 'description' (string), and 'severity' (string).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'keyword' argument is not a valid keyword or the 'max_results' argument is not a valid integer.

tools.name: GetThreatDetails

parameters.name: threat_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the threat.

returns.name: threat_details
returns.description: An object containing 'threat_id' (string), 'domain' (string), 'description' (string), 'severity' (string), 'first_seen' (string, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'last_seen' (string, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD').

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'threat_id' argument is not a valid threat identifier.

tools.name: SearchPolicy
tools.summary: Search for security policies based on a keyword.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword to search for policies.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of policies to search for. One of ['whitelist', 'blacklist']. If not specified, all policies will be searched.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10.

returns.name: policies
returns.description: A list of objects, each object contains 'policy_id' (string), 'policy_name' (string), 'policy_description' (string), and 'policy_type' (string, one of ['whitelist', 'blacklist']).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'keyword' argument is empty, the 'type' argument is not one of ['whitelist', 'blacklist'], or the 'max_results' argument is not a positive integer.

tools.name: CreatePolicy
tools.summary: Create a new security policy.

parameters.name: policy_name
parameters.description: The name of the policy.

parameters.name: policy_description
parameters.description: A brief description of the policy.

parameters.name: policy_type
parameters.description: The type of the policy. One of ['whitelist', 'blacklist'].

parameters.name: domains
parameters.description: An array of strings, each string is a domain to be added to the policy.

returns.name: policy_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the created policy.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'policy_name' argument is empty, the 'policy_description' argument is empty, the 'policy_type' argument is not one of ['whitelist', 'blacklist'], or the 'domains' argument is empty.

exceptions.name: ConflictException

tools.name: UpdatePolicy

parameters.name: policy_name
parameters.description: The new name of the policy.

parameters.name: policy_description
parameters.description: The new description of the policy.

parameters.name: policy_type
parameters.description: The new type of the policy. One of ['whitelist', 'blacklist'].

parameters.name: domains
parameters.description: An array of strings, each string is a domain to be added to the policy.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the policy was successfully updated.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'policy_id' argument is not a valid policy identifier, the 'policy_name' argument is empty, the 'policy_description' argument is empty, the 'policy_type' argument is not one of ['whitelist', 'blacklist'], or the 'domains' argument is empty.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'policy_id' does not exist.

tools.name: DeletePolicy
tools.summary: Delete an existing security policy.

parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the policy to be deleted.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the policy was successfully deleted.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'policy_id' argument is not a valid policy identifier.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'policy_id' does not exist.

tools.name: GetPolicyDetails
tools.summary: Get detailed information about a specific security policy.

parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the policy.

returns.name: policy_details
returns.description: An object containing 'policy_id' (string), 'policy_name' (string), 'policy_description' (string), 'policy_type' (string, one of ['whitelist', 'blacklist']), and 'domains' (array of strings).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'policy_id' argument is not a valid policy identifier.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The policy does not exist.

tools.name: SearchLogs
tools.summary: Search for security logs based on a keyword, date range, or event type.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword to search for logs.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of the date range to search, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the date range to search, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: event_type
parameters.description: One of ['allowed', 'blocked'].

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10.

returns.name: logs
returns.description: A list of objects, each object contains 'log_id' (string), 'timestamp' (string, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'), 'event_type' (string, one of ['allowed', 'blocked']), 'domain' (string), 'user' (string).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'keyword' argument is not a valid keyword, the 'start_date' or 'end_date' argument is not a valid date, the 'event_type' argument is not one of ['allowed', 'blocked'], or the 'max_results' argument is not a valid integer.

tools.name: GetLogDetails
tools.summary: Get detailed information about a specific security log.

parameters.name: log_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the log.

returns.name: log_details
returns.description: An object containing 'log_id' (string), 'timestamp' (string, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'), 'event_type' (string, one of ['allowed', 'blocked']), 'domain' (string), 'user' (string), 'device' (string), 'location' (string).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'log_id' argument is not a valid log identifier.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The log does not exist.

tools.name: GenerateReport
tools.summary: Generate a security report based on a date range and report type.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of the date range for the report, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the date range for the report, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: report_type
parameters.description: One of ['summary', 'detailed'].

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Whether to download the report. Default is false.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the report was successfully generated.

returns.name: report_path

returns.name: report_content

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'start_date' or 'end_date' argument is not a valid date, the 'report_type' argument is not one of ['summary', 'detailed'], or the 'download' argument is not a valid boolean.

description_for_model: A toolkit for managing GitHub repositories, including searching for repositories, retrieving repository details, searching and reading issues, managing collaborators, listing and reading repository files, as well as searching for users and retrieving user details.
description_for_human: Toolkit for managing GitHub repositories and user details.

tools.name: SearchRepositories
tools.summary: Search for repositories by keywords and scope. The user can search all repositories on Github, owned repositories, or member repositories. When the keywords are not provided, the user can search for all repositories in the specified scope.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: The keywords to search for in the repositories. Default is search for all repositories in the specified scope.

parameters.name: search_scope
parameters.description: The scope of the search. Can be 'all' (all repositories on Github), 'owned' (only repositories the user owns), 'member' (only repositories where the user is a collaborator on). Default is 'all'.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 5, maximum is 10.

returns.name: repositories
returns.description: Each object contains id (string), name (string), owner_username (string), description (string), url (string), is_owner (boolean), is_member (boolean), and is_public (boolean).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: If search_scope is not 'all', 'owned' or 'member'. If max_results is not between 1 and 10.

tools.name: GetRepositoryDetails
tools.summary: Retrieve repository details, including issues, branches.

parameters.name: repo_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository.

returns.name: details
returns.description: Contains name (string), owner (string), description (string), url (string), branches (array of branch names), visibility (string, one of ['public', 'private']), last_updated (string, format: 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM:SS') and statistics (including number of issues, number of stars, number of forks).

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: If repo_id does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: If repo_id is not a valid repository id.

tools.name: CreateRepository
tools.summary: Create a repository in the user's account.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the repository.

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: The visibility of the repository, one of ['public', 'private'].

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the repository.

returns.name: repo_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the created repository.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: If name is empty or visibility is not one of ['public', 'private'].

tools.name: DeleteRepository
tools.summary: Delete a user owned repository. Only valid if the user owns the repository.

parameters.name: repo_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Indicates if the operation was successful.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: If repo_id does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: If repo_id is not owned by the user.

tools.name: UpdateRespository
tools.summary: Update a user owned repository's name, description, or visibility. Only valid if the user owns the repository.

parameters.name: repo_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The new name of the repository.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The new description of the repository.

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: The new visibility of the repository, one of ['public', 'private'].

returns.name: success
returns.description: Indicates if the operation was successful.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: If repo_id does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: If visibility is not one of ['public', 'private'] or repo_id is not owned by the user.

tools.name: PostIssue
tools.summary: Create issues in a repository.

parameters.name: repo_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the issue.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body of the issue.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Indicates if the operation was successful.

returns.name: issue_id
returns.description: The unique identifier of the created issue.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: If repo_id does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: If repo_id is not a valid repository id, or title is empty.

tools.name: SearchIssues
tools.summary: Search for issues in a repository by keywords.

parameters.name: repo_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: The keywords to search for in the issues.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 5, maximum is 10.

returns.name: issues
returns.description: A list of issues matching the search criteria, each issue is a dictionary with keys 'issue_id' and 'title'.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: If repo_id does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: If max_results is not within the range [1, 10].

tools.name: ReadIssue
tools.summary: Retrieve issue details in a repository.

parameters.name: repo_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository.

parameters.name: issue_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the issue.

returns.name: details
returns.description: Contains title (string), body (string), state (string), timestamp (string, format: 'YYYY-MM-DD:HH:MM:SS'), and comments (array of string).

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: If repo_id or issue_id does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: If repo_id is not a valid repository id, or issue_id is not a valid issue id.

tools.name: ManageCollaborator
tools.summary: Add or remove repository collaborators. Only valid if the user owns the repository.

parameters.name: repo_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to perform. Can be 'add' or 'remove'.

parameters.name: collaborator_username
parameters.description: The username of the collaborator.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Indicates if the operation was successful.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: If repo_id does not exist, or collaborator_username does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: If repo_id is not a valid repository id, action is not 'add' or 'remove', or collaborator_username is not a valid username, or the user is not the owner of the repository.

tools.name: SearchUsers
tools.summary: Search for users by keywords.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: The keywords to search for in the users.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10.

returns.name: usernames
returns.description: The usernames of the users that match the keywords.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: If keywords is empty, or max_results is not a positive integer.

tools.name: GetUserDetails
tools.summary: Retrieve user details.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user.

returns.name: details
returns.description: Contains username (string), name (string), email (string), short_bio (string).

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: If username does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: If username is not a valid username.

description_for_model: A people search engine that provides access to personal data from public records, social media, and other sources for background checks, identity verification, and contact information retrieval. It offers tools for searching for people, retrieving personal data, performing background checks, verifying identities, monitoring data changes, retrieving historical data, accessing court records, retrieving criminal history, performing reverse phone lookups, and downloading public records.
description_for_human: Toolkit for searching and retrieving personal data from various sources.

tools.name: SearchPeople
tools.summary: Search for people by name, email, phone number, or address.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The search term.

parameters.name: search_type
parameters.description: The type of search: 'name', 'email', 'phone', 'address', must be one of these four values.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return, default is 10, must be a positive integer.

returns.name: results
returns.description: A list of objects, each object contains 'unique_id' (string), 'name' (string), 'location' (string), 'age_range' (string), and 'related_to' (array of strings).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'search_term' is not a valid name, email, phone number, or address, or the 'search_type' is not one of the four valid values.

tools.name: GetPersonDetails
tools.summary: Retrieve personal data for a specific person using their unique identifier.

parameters.name: unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the person, must be a valid unique identifier.

returns.name: person_data
returns.description: An object containing 'name' (string), 'location' (string), 'age_range' (string), 'related_to' (array of strings), 'contact_info' (object, contains 'phone_numbers' (array of strings), 'email_addresses' (array of strings), and 'addresses' (array of strings)), 'social_profiles' (array of strings), and 'public_records' (array of strings).

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'unique_id' does not correspond to any person in the database.

tools.name: BackgroundCheck
tools.summary: Perform a background check on a person using their unique identifier.

parameters.name: unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the person, must be a valid unique identifier.

returns.name: background_data
returns.description: An object containing 'criminal_records' (array of strings), 'court_records' (array of strings), 'employment_history' (array of strings), 'education_history' (array of strings), and 'licenses' (array of strings).

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'unique_id' does not correspond to any person in the database.

tools.name: VerifyIdentity
tools.summary: Verify a person's identity using their unique identifier and provided data.

parameters.name: unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the person, must be a valid unique identifier.

parameters.name: provided_data
parameters.description: The data to be verified, must match the format of the data in 'person_data'.

returns.name: verification_result
returns.description: True if the provided data matches the person's data, false otherwise.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'unique_id' does not correspond to any person in the database.

tools.name: MonitorDataChanges
tools.summary: Monitor changes in a person's personal data using their unique identifier.

parameters.name: unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the person, must be a valid unique identifier.

returns.name: data_changes
returns.description: A list of objects, each object contains 'changed_data' (object, contains the changed data in the same format as 'person_data'), 'timestamp' (string, the timestamp of the change, in ISO 8601 format).

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'unique_id' does not correspond to any person in the database.

tools.name: GetHistoricalData
tools.summary: Retrieve historical data on a person using their unique identifier.

parameters.name: unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the person, must be a valid unique identifier.

returns.name: historical_data
returns.description: A list of objects, each object contains 'historical_data' (object, contains the historical data in the same format as 'person_data'), 'timestamp' (string, the timestamp of the data, in ISO 8601 format).

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'unique_id' does not correspond to any person in the database.

tools.name: AccessCourtRecords
tools.summary: Access court records for a person using their unique identifier.

parameters.name: unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the person, must be a valid unique identifier.

returns.name: court_records
returns.description: A list of objects, each object contains 'court_record_data' (string), 'timestamp' (string, the timestamp of the court record, in ISO 8601 format).

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'unique_id' does not correspond to any person in the database.

tools.name: GetCriminalHistory
tools.summary: Retrieve a person's criminal history using their unique identifier.

parameters.name: unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the person, must be a valid unique identifier.

returns.name: criminal_history
returns.description: A list of objects, each object contains 'criminal_record_data' (string), 'timestamp' (string, the timestamp of the criminal record, in ISO 8601 format).

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'unique_id' does not correspond to any person in the database.

tools.name: ReversePhoneLookup
tools.summary: Perform a reverse phone lookup using a phone number.

parameters.name: phone_number
parameters.description: The phone number to look up, must be a valid phone number.

returns.name: lookup_result
returns.description: An object containing the person's 'unique_id' (string), 'name' (string), 'location' (string), 'age_range' (string), and 'related_to' (array of strings).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'phone_number' is not a valid phone number.

tools.name: DownloadPublicRecord
tools.summary: Download a specific public record for a person using their unique identifier and the record identifier.

parameters.name: unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the person, must be a valid unique identifier.

parameters.name: record_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the public record, must be a valid record identifier.

parameters.name: local_file_path
parameters.description: The local file path to save the downloaded record, must be a valid file path.

returns.name: download_status
returns.description: True if the download was successful, false otherwise.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'unique_id' or 'record_id' does not correspond to any person or record in the database.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'local_file_path' is not a valid file path.

description_for_model: The EpicFHIR toolkit provides a comprehensive set of tools for healthcare organizations to manage and share patient data, including demographics, clinical data, appointments, clinical documents, patient records, and diagnostic reports.
description_for_human: Toolkit for managing and sharing patient data in healthcare organizations.

tools.name: SearchPatients
tools.summary: Search for patients by patient's name, ID, or other information (such as demographic information or disease)

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The search term to use for finding patients, it can be a patient's name, ID, or other information.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return, default is 10.

returns.name: patients_info
returns.description: An array of objects of patient information, each containing fields 'patient_id', 'name', 'age', 'gender'.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'search_term' is not a valid string or the 'max_results' is not a valid integer.

tools.name: GetPatientDetails
tools.summary: Retrieve patient demographics and clinical data, such as medications, allergies, and conditions.

parameters.name: patient_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the patient.

returns.name: patient_data
returns.description: The patient demographics and clinical data, including fields 'name', 'age', 'gender', 'contact_info', 'medications', 'allergies', and 'conditions'.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'patient_id' does not exist.

tools.name: SearchDoctors
tools.summary: Search for doctors by doctor's name, ID, or specialty.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The search term to use for finding doctors, it can be a doctor's name, ID, or specialty.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return, default is 10.

returns.name: doctors_info
returns.description: An array of objects of doctor information, each containing fields 'doctor_id', 'name', 'specialty', 'contact_info'.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'search_term' is not a valid string or the 'max_results' is not a valid integer.

tools.name: ManageClinicalDocuments
tools.summary: List, create, update, and delete clinical documents, such as discharge summaries and progress notes.

parameters.name: patient_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the patient. The identifier should be a string of alphanumeric characters.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to perform on the clinical document. The value should be one of ['list', 'create', 'update', 'delete'].

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the clinical document, required for update and delete actions.

parameters.name: document_data
parameters.description: The clinical document data, required for create and update actions. The object includes fields such as 'type', 'date', 'summary', and 'details'.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return for the list action, default is 10.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the operation was successful.

returns.name: documents
returns.description: An array of objects each containing the 'document_id' and 'document_data' (including fields such as 'type', 'date', 'summary', and 'details'). Returned the created document for the create action and listed documents for the list action, otherwise empty.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'patient_id' does not exist or the 'action' is not one of ['list', 'create', 'update', 'delete'].

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'document_id' does not exist for update or delete actions.

tools.name: ManageAppointments
tools.summary: List, access, create, update, and delete patient appointments.

parameters.name: patient_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the patient. The identifier should be a string of alphanumeric characters.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to perform on the appointment. The value should be one of ['list', 'create', 'update', 'delete'].

parameters.name: appointment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the appointment, required for update and delete actions.

parameters.name: appointment_data
parameters.description: The appointment data, required for create and update actions. The object includes fields such as 'date', 'time', 'location', and 'doctor_id'.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return for the list action, default is 10.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the operation was successful.

returns.name: appointments
returns.description: An array of objects each containing the 'appointment_id' and 'appointment_data' (including fields such as 'date', 'time', 'location', 'doctor_id', and 'doctor_name'). Returned the created appointment for the create action and listed appointments for the list action, otherwise empty.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'patient_id' does not exist or the 'action' is not one of ['list', 'create', 'update', 'delete'].

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'appointment_id' does not exist for update or delete actions.

tools.name: ManagePatientRecords
tools.summary: List, create, update, and delete patient records.

parameters.name: patient_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the patient. The identifier should be a string of alphanumeric characters.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to perform on the patient record. The value should be one of ['list', 'create', 'update', 'delete'].

parameters.name: record_data
parameters.description: The patient record data, required for create and update actions. The object includes fields such as 'name', 'age', 'gender', 'medications', 'allergies', and 'conditions'.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return for the list action, default is 10.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the operation was successful.

returns.name: patient_records
returns.description: An array of objects each containing the 'patient_id' and 'record_data' (including fields such as 'name', 'age', 'gender', 'medications', 'allergies', and 'conditions'). Returned the created record for the create action and listed records for the list action, otherwise empty.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'patient_id' does not exist or the 'action' is not one of ['list', 'create', 'update', 'delete'].

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'patient_id' does not exist for update or delete actions.

tools.name: ManageDiagnosticReports
tools.summary: List, access, and manage patient diagnostic reports.

parameters.name: patient_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the patient. The identifier should be a string of alphanumeric characters.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to perform on the diagnostic report. The value should be one of ['list', 'create', 'update', 'delete'].

parameters.name: report_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the diagnostic report, required for update and delete actions. The identifier should be a string of alphanumeric characters.

parameters.name: report_data
parameters.description: The diagnostic report data, required for create and update actions. The object includes fields such as 'type', 'date', 'results', 'interpretation', 'doctor_id', 'doctor_name'.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return for the list action, default is 10.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the operation was successful.

returns.name: diagnostic_reports
returns.description: An array of objects each containing the 'report_id' and 'report_data' (including fields such as 'type', 'date', 'results', and 'interpretation'). Returned the created report for the create action and listed reports for the list action, otherwise empty.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'patient_id' does not exist or the 'action' is not one of ['list', 'create', 'update', 'delete'].

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'report_id' does not exist for update or delete actions.

tools.name: DownloadFiles
tools.summary: Download files by their unique identifiers.

parameters.name: file_ids
parameters.description: The unique identifiers of the files to download. Each should be a valid 'document_id', 'record_id' or 'report_id'.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the operation was successful.

returns.name: file_paths
returns.description: The list of local paths of the downloaded files. Returned if the file was successfully downloaded, otherwise empty.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: At least one of the 'file_ids' does not exist.

description_for_model: A set of tools for monitoring, managing, and controlling city traffic. It includes tools for searching for locations, getting location details, and controlling traffic lights. It also supports predcting congestion, analyzing traffic patterns, and scheduling road maintenance.
description_for_human: Toolkit for monitoring, managing, and controlling city traffic.

tools.name: SearchLocations
tools.summary: Searches for locations (roads or intersections) by name.

parameters.name: location_name
parameters.description: The name of the location to search for.

parameters.name: location_type
parameters.description: The type of the location to search for, can only be 'road' or 'intersection'. If not specified, both types are searched.

returns.name: locations
returns.description: A list of locations matching the search query, each is an object containing 'location_id' (string, the unique identifier of the location), 'location_type' (string, the type of the location, can only be 'road', 'intersection'), and 'location_name' (string, the name of the location, for intersections it is the name of the first road followed by the name of the second road, e.g., 'Main St and 1st Ave').

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'location_name' argument is empty, or the 'location_type' is not one of ['road', 'intersection'].

tools.name: GetRoadDetails
tools.summary: Gets the details of a road by its unique identifier.

parameters.name: road_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the road to get details for.

returns.name: road_details
returns.description: The details of the road, includes fields such as 'name', 'type' (can only be 'road'), 'connected_roads' (an array of connected roads, each is an object containing 'road_id' and 'road_name').

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'road_id' does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'road_id' argument is empty.

tools.name: GetIntersectionDetails
tools.summary: Gets the details of an intersection by its unique identifier.

parameters.name: intersection_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the intersection to get details for.

returns.name: intersection_details
returns.description: The details of the intersection, includes fields such as 'name' (the name of the first road followed by the name of the second road, e.g., 'Main St and 1st Ave'), 'type' (can only be 'intersection'), 'connected_roads' (an array of connected roads, each is an object containing 'road_id' and 'road_name'), 'traffic_lights' (an array of objects containing 'traffic_light_type' which can be 'vehicle' or 'pedestrian', and 'traffic_light_id' which is the unique identifier of the traffic light concatenated by the type and the direction, e.g., 'vehicle-north-south', typically there will be two lights per intersection: 'north-south' for the north-south direction and 'east-west' for the east-west direction, and 'traffic_light_state' which can be 'red', 'green', 'yellow', or 'hazard' for 'vehicle' lights, and can be 'walk', 'stop', or 'flashing' for 'pedestrian' lights),

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'intersection_id' does not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'intersection_id' argument is empty.

tools.name: SearchRoute
tools.summary: Searches for the optimal route between an origin and a destination.

parameters.name: origin_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the origin location (road or intersection).

parameters.name: destination_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the destination location (road or intersection).

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of routes to return, optional, default is 1.

returns.name: routes
returns.description: Each object contains 'route' (array of objects, each is a location in the route, contains 'location_id', 'location_name', and 'location_type', should be in order from origin to destination and interleave roads and intersections), and 'estimated_time' (string, the estimated time to travel the route in the format 'hh:mm:ss'). The number of objects in the array does not exceed `max_results`.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'origin_id' or 'destination_id' arguments do not exist.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'origin_id' or 'destination_id' arguments are empty, or the 'max_results' argument is not a positive integer.

tools.name: CheckTrafficLightsStates
tools.summary: Checks the current states of traffic lights (including both vehicle and pedestrian lights) at a specific intersection.

parameters.name: intersection_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the intersection to check.

returns.name: light_states
returns.description: A list of traffic light states, each is an object containing 'traffic_light_type' (can be 'vehicle' or 'pedestrian'), 'traffic_light_id' (the unique identifier of the traffic light concatenated by the type and the direction, e.g., 'vehicle-north-south', typically there will be two lights per intersection: 'north-south' for the north-south direction and 'east-west' for the east-west direction), and 'traffic_light_state' (for 'vehicle' lights, can be 'red', 'green', 'yellow', or 'hazard'; for 'pedestrian' lights, can be 'walk', 'stop', or 'flashing').

tools.name: ManageTrafficLightState
tools.summary: Changes the state of a traffic light at a specific intersection, either immediately, or at a scheduled time.

parameters.name: intersection_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the intersection where the traffic light is located.

parameters.name: traffic_light_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the traffic light to change concatenated by the type and the direction, e.g., 'vehicle-north-south'. The type can be 'vehicle' or 'pedestrian'. Typically there will be two lights per intersection: 'north-south' for the north-south direction and 'east-west' for the east-west direction.

parameters.name: traffic_light_state
parameters.description: The new state of the traffic light, for 'vehicle' lights, can be 'red', 'green', 'yellow', or 'hazard'; for 'pedestrian' lights, can be 'walk', 'stop', or 'flashing'.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The start time of the command in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss'. If not provided, the command takes effect immediately.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: The end time of the command in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss'.

returns.name: operation_success
returns.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'intersection_id', 'traffic_light_id', or 'traffic_light_state' arguments are empty, or the 'traffic_light_state' argument is not one of specified values, or the 'start_time' or 'end_time' arguments are not in the correct format.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'intersection_id' or 'traffic_light_id' arguments do not exist.

tools.name: MonitorTrafficCongestion
tools.summary: Monitors the traffic congestion level on a specific road or intersection.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the road or intersection to monitor.

returns.name: congestion_level
returns.description: The level of traffic congestion, can only be 'low', 'medium', 'high', or 'severe'.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'location_id' argument does not correspond to a valid location.

tools.name: PredictTrafficCongestion
tools.summary: Predicts traffic congestion at a specific road or intersection in the future based on historical data and current conditions.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the road or intersection to predict congestion for.

parameters.name: prediction_start_time
parameters.description: The start time of the prediction in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss'.

parameters.name: prediction_end_time
parameters.description: The end time of the prediction in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss'.

returns.name: predicted_congestion_level
returns.description: The predicted level of traffic congestion, can only be 'low', 'medium', 'high', or 'severe'.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'location_id' argument does not correspond to a valid location.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'prediction_start_time' or 'prediction_end_time' arguments are not in the correct format, or the 'prediction_start_time' argument is not before the 'prediction_end_time' argument, or the 'prediction_start_time' argument is not in the future.

tools.name: AnalyzeTrafficPatterns
tools.summary: Analyzes traffic patterns at a specific road or intersection over a specified period in the past.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the road or intersection to analyze.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The start time of the period in the past to analyze in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss'.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: The end time of the period in the past to analyze in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss'.

returns.name: analysis_result
returns.description: The result of the traffic pattern analysis, includes fields such as 'average_congestion_level' (can only be 'low', 'medium', 'high', or 'severe'), 'peak_periods' (an array of objects with 'start_time' and 'end_time' fields, each in the format 'hh:mm') and 'low_periods' (an array of objects with 'start_time' and 'end_time' fields, each in the format 'hh:mm').

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: The 'location_id' argument does not correspond to a valid location.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'start_time' or 'end_time' arguments are not in the correct format, or the 'start_time' argument is after the 'end_time' argument, or the 'start_time' or 'end_time' arguments are not in the past.

tools.name: GivePriorityToEmergencyVehicle

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: The end time of the priority period in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss'.

returns.name: operation_success
returns.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'intersection_ids' argument is empty, or the 'start_time' or 'end_time' arguments are not in the correct format, or the 'start_time' argument is after the 'end_time' argument, or the 'start_time' or 'end_time' arguments are not in the future.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: One or more of the 'intersection_ids' arguments do not exist.
