category: Financial, Payment Gateway, and CRM Tools
description_for_model: A comprehensive toolkit for an online self-directed stock broker, which allows Users to buy and sell stocks.
description_for_human: Toolkit for an online self-directed stock broker.

tools.name: GetHoldingsInformation
tools.summary: Retrieve information about the holdings in an account that belongs to the User.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The account type, one of ['self-directed TFSA', 'self-directed non-registered'].

returns.name: holdings
returns.description: A list of objects containing the holding ticker (e.g. MSFT or AAPL) and the holding amount in USD.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'account' parameter is not in the correct format.

tools.name: GetBalance
tools.summary: Retrieve the balance of an account that belongs to the User.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The account type, one of ['self-directed TFSA', 'self-directed non-registered'].

returns.name: balance
returns.description: The balance of the account in USD.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'account' parameter is not in the correct format.

tools.name: TradeStock
tools.summary: Places an order for a stock.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The account number in which to purchase a stock. Must be a 'self-directed TFSA' account or a 'self-directed non-registered' account.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Whether to buy or sell the stock. One of ['buy', 'sell']

parameters.name: order_type
parameters.description: One of ['limit_order', 'market_order']

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker of the stock.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The number of shares to buy or sell.

parameters.name: price_limit
parameters.description: Only required for limit orders. The maximum or minimum price at which to buy or sell.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the order was successful placed.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: One of the parameters are not in the correct format or are invalid.

tools.name: GetStockInformation
tools.summary: Gets information about a stock.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker of the stock.

returns.name: stock_info
returns.description: An object containing 'bid' (number, the bid price in USD), 'bid_lot_size' (integer, the bid lot size), 'ask' (number, the ask price in USD), 'ask_lot_size' (integer, the ask lot size), 'daily_volume' (integer, the daily volume).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The ticker is invalid.

category: Financial, Payment Gateway, and CRM Tools
description_for_model: A comprehensive toolkit for managing personal investments, including retrieving information about holdings, searching for investment options, making transactions and searching transaction history.
description_for_human: Toolkit for managing personal investments.

tools.name: GetHoldingsInformation
tools.summary: Retrieve information about the holdings in an account that belongs to the User.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The account type, one of ['non-registered', 'TFSA', 'RRSP'].

returns.name: holdings
returns.description: A list of objects, each containing 'type' (string, the type of the holding, e.g. cash, GIC, mutual fund or ETF), 'name' (string, the name of the holding), 'amount' (number, the total amount in USD), 'return' (number, the annualized return of the holding).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'account' parameter is not in the correct format.

tools.name: ListTransactions
tools.summary: Lists the transactions for a particular account.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The account type, one of ['non-registered', 'TFSA', 'RRSP'].

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of the transactions in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd'. Default is the start of the account.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the transactions in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd'. Default is today.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return, default is 10, must be between 1 and 50.

returns.name: transactions
returns.description: A list of objects containing the 'date' (string, in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'type' (string, the type of the holding, e.g. GIC, mutual fund or ETF), 'name' (string, the name of the holding), 'action' (string, one of ['buy', 'sell']), 'amount' (number, the amount in USD).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'account', 'start_date', 'end_date', or 'max_results' parameters are not in the correct format or are invalid.

tools.name: SearchInvestments
tools.summary: Search available investments by keyword.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The keyword to search for.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of investment to search for, e.g. 'mutual_fund', 'ETF', 'GIC'.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return, default is 5, maximum is 10.

returns.name: investment_options
returns.description: A list of objects, each object contains 'name' (string, the name of the investment option), 'description' (string, the description of the investment option), 'risk_disclosures' (object, detailed risk disclosures for this investment such as volatility and age suitability), 'min_purchase_amount' (number, the minimum amount that can be purchased in USD), 'return' (number, the annualized return of the fund).

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'max_results' is not between 1 and 10, or the 'type' is not a valid investment type.

tools.name: MakeTransaction
tools.summary: Buy investment options or sell holdings.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The account type, one of ['non-registered', 'TFSA', 'RRSP'].

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Whether to buy or sell the mutual fund. One of ['buy', 'sell']

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the investment option to buy or the holding to sell.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The total amount to be purchased, in USD.

returns.name: success
returns.description: Whether the transaction was successful.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'account', 'action' or 'amount' parameters are not in the correct format or are invalid. Or the transaction would result in a negative balance.

exceptions.name: NotFoundException
exceptions.description: There is no investment option or holding with the given name.
